characteristics.name: First Creation
characteristics.description: "Let there be light" - the initial act that separates chaos from cosmos

characteristics.name: Consciousness
characteristics.description: Awareness, enlightenment, the awakening of mind

characteristics.name: Order
characteristics.description: The organizing principle that creates structure from formlessness

characteristics.name: Truth
characteristics.description: Revealing what is hidden, dispelling illusion and ignorance

characteristics.name: Divine Presence
characteristics.description: The visible manifestation of godhood, the glory of deity

characteristics.name: Life Force
characteristics.description: The vital radiance that animates existence

characteristics.name: Purity
characteristics.description: Untainted, uncorrupted, the essence of holiness

characteristics.name: Vision
characteristics.description: The power to see, perceive, and comprehend reality

characteristics.name: Transcendence
characteristics.description: Rising above material limitation into spiritual realm

characteristics.name: Creation
characteristics.description: The generative power that brings new forms into being
